justification: Sudden exogenous event (bird strike), no progressive decision chain. Honest k is 1.
Active corrosion degrading slat actuator over time, not static background.
Active engine degradation pilot had evidence of from prior flights.
Ongoing medication impairment directly enabling pivot, biggest contributing factor (w=70).
Progressive icing accumulation during flight, not a static precondition.
Latent code fault with repurposed flag is active part of failure chain, not background.
